title: Topic 006 Question 027
body: You use Microsoft Defender for IoT in an Azure IoT solution.
You need to exclude some security events. The solution must minimize development effort.
options: Create an Azure function to filter security messages.
Add a configuration to the code of the physical IoT device.
Create an DefenderIotMicroAgent module twin and add configuration details to the module twin object.
Add configuration details to the device twin object.
